mapper.select: select round(avg(replace(hd.dealAmount,',','')),-3) as dealAmount, round(avg(hd.area),2) as area, max(hd.floor) as floor, hd.aptCode, tmp.lat, tmp.lng, tmp.apartmentName, tmp.address from housedeal hd inner join (SELECT hi.aptCode, hi.apartmentName, concat(sidoName,' ',gugunName,' ',dong,' ',roadName,' ',jibun) address, lng, lat FROM houseinfo hi INNER JOIN dongcode dc ON hi.dongCode = dc.dongCode) tmp on hd.aptCode = tmp.aptCode group by hd.aptCode;

select round(avg(replace(hd.dealAmount,',','')),-3) as dealAmount, round(avg(hd.area),2) as area, max(hd.floor) as floor, hd.aptCode, tmp.lat, tmp.lng, tmp.apartmentName, tmp.address from housedeal hd inner join (SELECT hi.aptCode, hi.apartmentName, concat(sidoName,' ',gugunName,' ',dong,' ',roadName,' ',jibun) address, lng, lat FROM houseinfo hi INNER JOIN dongcode dc ON hi.dongCode = dc.dongCode WHERE dc.sidoName = #{sidoName} AND dc.gugunName like concat('%',#{gugunName},'%') AND dc.dongName like concat('%',#{dongName},'%')) tmp on hd.aptCode = tmp.aptCode group by hd.aptCode;

select round(avg(replace(hd.dealAmount,',','')),-3) as dealAmount, round(avg(hd.area),2) as area, max(hd.floor) as floor, hd.aptCode, tmp.lat, tmp.lng, tmp.apartmentName, tmp.address from housedeal hd inner join (SELECT hi.aptCode, hi.apartmentName, concat(sidoName,' ',gugunName,' ',dong,' ',roadName,' ',jibun) address, lng, lat FROM houseinfo hi INNER JOIN dongcode dc ON hi.dongCode = dc.dongCode WHERE dc.dongName like concat('%',#{dong},'%')) tmp on hd.aptCode = tmp.aptCode group by hd.aptCode;

SELECT member_id as id, houseinfo_aptcode as aptcode, apartmentname, concat(d.sidoName, ' ', d.gugunName, ' ', d.dongName) as address FROM user_houseinfo uh inner join houseinfo h on uh.houseinfo_aptcode = h.aptcode inner join dongcode d on h.dongcode = d.dongcode where member_id = #{id} and flag = true
